.
Considering FPOW Protocol Examination Reports
Carefully consider former prisoner of war (FPOW) protocol examination reports because they may provide sufficient background information to relate the Veteranâ€™s current symptomatology to the FPOW experience.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Principles of Reviewing and Weighing Evidence
